name: Noto Sans Thaana
description: Noto is a global font collection for writing in all modern and ancient languages. Noto Sans Thaana is an unmodulated (“sans serif”) design for texts in the Indic Thaana script. It has multiple weights and 90 glyphs. Noto Sans Thaana 3 is a redesigned version of Noto Sans Thaana in response to community feedback.
author: Google
